item.title: General Motors Co 10-K
item.description: General Motors Co, which is in the Motor Vehicles & Passenger Car Bodies [3711] industry, SEC 10-K filing on January 31, 2023 had 41595 (cleaned) words - 600 were utilized for the visualizations. Top Words: 2022 - 440 instances financial - 436 instances 31 - 427 instances december - 423 instances gm - 349 instances See the parsed data used in the visualization here. View the actual filing on the SEC website here
